org.bwapi.bridge
Interface BridgeBotFactory

public interface BridgeBotFactory

Factory for loading a bot based on the given game. In order to register a factory, use the service provider mechanism as mentioned in ServiceLoader. If no factories return a valid bot, the NopBot is used.

Author:
Chad Retz

Method Summary
 BridgeBot getBridgeBot(Game game)
          Get the bot based on the given game.
 

Method Detail

getBridgeBot

BridgeBot getBridgeBot(Game game)
Get the bot based on the given game. If the result is null, the next factory is tried.

Parameters:
game -
Returns:
